item.title: Mentioned by The Vancouver Observer
item.description:
Local Filipino Canadian magazine editor resigns, citing Tory influence on media
Philippine Journal is run by Irene Yatco, who herself ran unsuccessfully against NDP MP Libby Davies in the 2011 election as a Conservative MP. Cholo Insua, who runs Planet Philippines, is also currently a member of the federal Conservative party, though ...
